titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C32

body.ab: <lb n="c57-0168__main__3"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0168.14" unit="tei:head"/>Walton in continuation.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0168__main__4"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0168.02" unit="tei:date"/>August 1<mdel>6</mdel>3th<lb n="c57-0168__main__5"/> You have read this strange & terrific story, <lb n="c57-0168__main__6"/> Marg<mdel>e</mdel>aret and <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>do not you feel your blood con<lb n="c57-0168__main__7"/>gealed with horror Mine oftendid as he <lb n="c57-0168__main__8"/> related it<lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__1"/> like that <lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__2"/> which even <lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__3"/> now curdles <lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__4"/> mine – <del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30338__Start"/>When<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30338__End"/>Sometimes seized with <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>sudden agony he <lb n="c57-0168__main__9"/> could not continue <mdel>or</mdel>his tale, at others his voice broken <lb n="c57-0168__main__10"/> yet piercing <del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30368__Start"/>described some of the scenes<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30368__End"/>uttered the words of which it is<lb n="c57-0168__main__11"/>composed.<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30377__Start"/>he had passed<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30377__End"/><del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30380__Start"/>through<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30380__End"/> – His fine & lovely <lb n="c57-0168__main__12"/> eyes <metamark>^</metamark>were now lighted up <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>with indignation <mdel>or</mdel>now subdued <lb n="c57-0168__main__13"/><mdel>by</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to downcast sorrow & infinite wretchedness. Sometimes <lb n="c57-0168__main__14"/> he commanded his countenance & tones <lb n="c57-0168__main__15"/> and related the most horrible incidents <lb n="c57-0168__main__16"/> with a <del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30439__Start"/>smothered<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30439__End"/>tranquil voice suppressing every <lb n="c57-0168__main__17"/> mark of <del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30448__Start"/>indi<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30448__End"/> agitation – <del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30453__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30453__End"/>then like a vol<lb n="c57-0168__main__18"/>cano bursting forth his face would sud<lb n="c57-0168__main__19"/>denly change to an expression of the <lb n="c57-0168__main__20"/> wildest rage as he shrieked <del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30476__Start"/>forth<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30476__End"/><lb n="c57-0168__main__21"/><lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__1"/>out his imprecations <mdel>of</mdel>^on hi<mdel>m</mdel>s persecutor.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0168__main__22"/> His tale is connected & told with <lb n="c57-0168__main__23"/> an appearance of the simplest truth <lb n="c57-0168__main__24"/> yet I own to you my sister that the <lb n="c57-0168__main__25"/> letters of Felix &<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30523__Start"/>Maimouna<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30523__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>Safie which he <lb n="c57-0168__main__26"/> shewed me & the apparition of the <lb n="c57-0168__main__27"/> monster seen from our ship brought <lb n="c57-0168__main__28"/> to me a greater conviction of the <del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30542__Start"/>fact<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30542__End"/>truth <lb n="c57-0168__left_margin__1"/>of his narrative<lb n="c57-0168__main__29"/> than his asserverations—however earnest & connected. Such a monster <lb n="c57-0168__main__30"/><del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30565__Start"/>did<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30565__End"/>has then real<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30572__Start"/>ly<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30572__End"/> existence, I <del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30580__Start"/>could<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30580__End"/><del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30583__Start"/>not<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30583__End"/>cannot doubt <lb n="c57-0168__main__31"/> it yet I <del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30595__Start"/>was<del loc="c57-0168__main__d1e30595__End"/>am lost in surpri<mdel>z</mdel>se &admira<lb n="c57-0168__main__32"/>tion. Sometimes I endeavoured to gain from<lb n="c57-0169__main__1"/> Frankenstein the particulars of his formation <lb n="c57-0169__main__2"/> but on this point he was impenetrable. Are you <lb n="c57-0169__main__3"/> mad, my friend, said he, or whither does your <lb n="c57-0169__main__4"/> senseless curiosity lead you –Would you also <lb n="c57-0169__main__5"/> create for yourself &for the world a dæmonical<lb n="c57-0169__main__6"/> ene<mdel>n</mdel>my or to what do<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30650__Start"/>es<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30650__End"/> your questions <lb n="c57-0169__main__7"/> tend. Peace, peace; learn my miseries &<lb n="c57-0169__main__8"/> do not seek to encrease your own.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0169__main__9"/> Frankenstein discovered that I detail<lb n="c57-0169__main__10"/>ed or made notes concerning his history he <lb n="c57-0169__main__11"/> asked to see them & himself corrected <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>and augmented them <lb n="c57-0169__main__12"/> in many places but principally in <del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30683__Start"/>guv<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30683__End"/><lb n="c57-0169__main__13"/> giving the life & spirit of the <del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30688__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30688__End"/>conver<lb n="c57-0169__main__14"/>sations he held with his enemies–Since <lb n="c57-0169__main__15"/> you have made an account <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>said he I would <lb n="c57-0169__main__16"/> not that a mutilated one should go down to <lb n="c57-0169__main__17"/> posterity. <milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0169__main__18"/> Thus have ten days passed away <lb n="c57-0169__main__19"/> while I have listened to the strangest <lb n="c57-0169__main__20"/> tale that ever imagination formed. <lb n="c57-0169__main__21"/> My thoughts & every feeling of my soul <lb n="c57-0169__main__22"/><del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30730__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30730__End"/><mdel>ha</mdel>have been drunk up by the interrest <lb n="c57-0169__main__23"/><del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30745__Start"/>I felt in<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30745__End"/>for my guest <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0169.01">^</metamark><lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__1"/> which this <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__2"/><metamark function="displacement">x</metamark> tale, & his <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__3"/> own elevated <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__4"/>& gentle man<lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__5"/>ners have <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__6"/> created I wish<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30780__Start"/>ed<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30780__End"/> to soothe him <lb n="c57-0169__main__24"/> yet <del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30787__Start"/>could<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30787__End"/>can I <del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30796__Start"/>tell<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30796__End"/>counsel one so infinitely miserable. <lb n="c57-0169__main__25"/><del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30804__Start"/>Whose mind continually dwelt on horrors<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30804__End"/><lb n="c57-0169__main__26"/> so destitute of every hope of consolation to <lb n="c57-0169__main__27"/> live<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30812__Start"/>?<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30812__End"/> Oh no – the only joy he <del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30817__Start"/>could feel<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30817__End"/>can now <del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30822__Start"/>feel<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30822__End"/> know<lb n="c57-0169__main__28"/><del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30830__Start"/>was<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30830__End"/>will be<mdel>in</mdel>when he compos<mdel>in</mdel>es<mdel>g</mdel> his shattered <del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30861__Start"/>mind<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30861__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>feelings to <lb n="c57-0169__main__29"/> peace & death — Yet <del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30874__Start"/>one<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30874__End"/><del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30877__Start"/>feeling<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30877__End"/> he enjoys, <lb n="c57-0169__main__30"/> one comfort, the <del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30885__Start"/>sourse<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30885__End"/>offspring of solitude <lb n="c57-0169__main__31"/>& delirium — he <del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30894__Start"/>tho<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30894__End"/> believed that when <lb n="c57-0169__main__32"/> in dreams he <del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30901__Start"/>saw<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30901__End"/>holds converse with his friends, <del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30911__Start"/>who consoled<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30911__End"/><lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__1"/>& derives from <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__2"/> that communion <lb n="c57-0169__left_margin__3"/> consolation for<lb n="c57-0169__main__33"/> his miseries or <del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30931__Start"/>instigated him<del loc="c57-0169__main__d1e30931__End"/>excitement to <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>his vengeance<lb n="c57-0170__main__1"/> that they <del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30957__Start"/>were<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30957__End"/>are not the creations of his <lb n="c57-0170__main__2"/> fancy but the real beings <del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30966__Start"/>that he<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30966__End"/><del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30969__Start"/>saw<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30969__End"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__3"/><lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c57-0170__left_margin__d1e30978__Start"/>beheld <del loc="c57-0170__left_margin__d1e30978__End"/><del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30981__Start"/>and conversed with<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e30981__End"/><lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__1"/> who visit <lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__2"/> him from <lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__3"/> the regions <lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__4"/> of a <lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__5"/> remoter world –This faith g<mdel>a</mdel>ives a solemni<lb n="c57-0170__main__4"/>ty to his reveries that <del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31025__Start"/>made<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31025__End"/>render<mdel>ed</mdel> them <del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31034__Start"/>peculiar<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31034__End"/><del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31037__Start"/>ly<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31037__End"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__5"/><del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31041__Start"/>interresting.<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31041__End"/>to me, almost as imposing &inte<lb n="c57-0170__main__6"/>resting as truth.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__7"/> Our conversations <del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31062__Start"/>have<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31062__End"/>are not always <lb n="c57-0170__main__8"/><del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31070__Start"/>been<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31070__End"/> confined to his own history & misfortunes– <lb n="c57-0170__main__9"/><del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31074__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31074__End"/><mdel>o</mdel>On every point of general literature he <lb n="c57-0170__main__10"/> displays unbounded knowledge and a quick <lb n="c57-0170__main__11"/>& piercing apprehension. His eloquence is <lb n="c57-0170__main__12"/> forcible & touching nor can I hear him when <lb n="c57-0170__main__13"/> he narrates a pathetic incident or endea<lb n="c57-0170__main__14"/>vours to move the passions of pity & love without <lb n="c57-0170__main__15"/> tears. What a glorious creature must <del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31107__Start"/>this<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31107__End"/> he <lb n="c57-0170__main__16"/> have been in his days of prosperity when <lb n="c57-0170__main__17"/> he is thus noble & godlike in ruin – He seems <lb n="c57-0170__main__18"/> to feel his own worth & the greatness of <lb n="c57-0170__main__19"/> his fall. <del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31119__Start"/>I have felt, said he, great &<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31119__End"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__20"/> When younger, said he, I felt as if I was destin<lb n="c57-0170__main__21"/>ed for some great enterprize. My feelings <lb n="c57-0170__main__22"/> are profound but I possessed a coolness of judge<lb n="c57-0170__main__23"/>ment that fitted me for gr<mdel>an</mdel>eat<mdel>d</mdel>enter<lb n="c57-0170__main__24"/>prises<lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__1"/> illustrious <lb n="c57-0170__left_margin__2"/> atchievements. This sentiment of the worth of my <lb n="c57-0170__main__25"/> nature supported me when others would<lb n="c57-0170__main__26"/> have sunk for I deemed it criminal <lb n="c57-0170__main__27"/> to throw away in useless grief; those ta<lb n="c57-0170__main__28"/>lents that might be useful to my <lb n="c57-0170__main__29"/> fellow creatures – When I reflected on the <lb n="c57-0170__main__30"/> work that I had compleated, no less a one <lb n="c57-0170__main__31"/> than the creation of a sensitive &<lb n="c57-0170__main__32"/> rational animal I could not rank my<lb n="c57-0170__main__33"/>self with the herd of common projectors. <lb n="c57-0170__main__34"/> But this feeling which supported me <del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31209__Start"/>only<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31209__End"/><lb n="c57-0170__main__35"/> now serves <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>only to <del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31227__Start"/>sink<del loc="c57-0170__main__d1e31227__End"/>plunge me lower in <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the dust— All<lb n="c57-0171__main__1"/> my speculations & hopes are as nothing and like the <lb n="c57-0171__main__2"/> Archangel who aspired to omnipotence I am <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31253__Start"/>now<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31253__End"/><lb n="c57-0171__main__3"/> chained in an eternal hell. My imagination <lb n="c57-0171__main__4"/> was vivid yet my <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31261__Start"/>app<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31261__End"/> powers of application were in<lb n="c57-0171__main__5"/>tense – by the union of these qualities I <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31270__Start"/>ex<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31270__End"/> conceived <lb n="c57-0171__main__6"/> the idea and executed the <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31276__Start"/>desig<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31276__End"/> creation of a man– <lb n="c57-0171__main__7"/> Even now I cannot recollect without passion <lb n="c57-0171__main__8"/> my reveries while the work was incomplete –I <lb n="c57-0171__main__9"/> trod heaven in my thoughts – now exulting <lb n="c57-0171__main__10"/> in my powers – now <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31287__Start"/>wi<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31287__End"/> burning with the idea <lb n="c57-0171__main__11"/> of their consequen<mdel>s</mdel>ces. From my infancy I was <lb n="c57-0171__main__12"/> imbued with high hopes and a lofty ambition <lb n="c57-0171__main__13"/> but how am I sunk – Oh my friend – if you had <lb n="c57-0171__main__14"/> know<mdel>m</mdel>n me as I once was <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31318__Start"/>who<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31318__End"/> you would <lb n="c57-0171__main__15"/> not recognize me <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31323__Start"/>even<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31323__End"/> in this <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31328__Start"/>misery<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31328__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>state of <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31337__Start"/>dgr<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31337__End"/> degradationDespon<lb n="c57-0171__main__16"/>dancy rarely visited my heart a high destiny <lb n="c57-0171__main__17"/> seemed to bear me on, untill I fe<mdel>e</mdel>ll oh, never <lb n="c57-0171__main__18"/> never <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>again to rise" <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31372__Start"/>again<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31372__End"/>.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0171__main__19"/> Must I lose this <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31382__Start"/>creature<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31382__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>admirable being? I have <lb n="c57-0171__main__20"/> longed for a friend, I have sought one who would sympathize <lb n="c57-0171__main__21"/> with & love me. Behold on these desart seas <lb n="c57-0171__main__22"/> I have found <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31405__Start"/>one<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31405__End"/>such an one – but I fear I have gained him <lb n="c57-0171__main__23"/> but to know his value & lose him –I would <lb n="c57-0171__main__24"/> reconcile him with life but he repulses the <lb n="c57-0171__main__25"/> thought. "I thank you," Walton," he said, but <lb n="c57-0171__main__26"/> When for your kind intentions towards so <lb n="c57-0171__main__27"/> miserable a wretch – but when you speak <lb n="c57-0171__main__28"/> of new <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31434__Start"/>connections<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31434__End"/>ties and<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31444__Start"/>think<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31444__End"/>fresh affections think you that any <lb n="c57-0171__main__29"/> can replace those <del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31458__Start"/>I have lost<del loc="c57-0171__main__d1e31458__End"/><mdel>.</mdel>which are gone? Can any man <lb n="c57-0171__main__30"/> be to me as Clerval was or any woman ano<lb n="c57-0171__main__31"/>ther Elizabeth. Even where the affections are <lb n="c57-0171__main__32"/> not strongly moved by any superior excel<lb n="c57-0171__main__33"/>lence the companions of our childhood al<lb n="c57-0172__main__1"/>ways possess a certain power over our mind <lb n="c57-0172__main__2"/> that hardly any other later friend can <lb n="c57-0172__main__3"/> obtain. They know our infantine feelings <lb n="c57-0172__main__4"/> which however they may be afterwards <lb n="c57-0172__main__5"/> modified are never <del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31509__Start"/>entirely changed<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31509__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>eradicated and they <lb n="c57-0172__main__6"/> can judge of our actions with greater <lb n="c57-0172__main__7"/> certainty – A sister or brother can never, un<lb n="c57-0172__main__8"/>less indeed such symtoms have been shewn <lb n="c57-0172__main__9"/> early suspect the other of fraud or false <lb n="c57-0172__main__10"/> dealing when another friend however <lb n="c57-0172__main__11"/> strongly he may be attatched may <del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31542__Start"/>feel<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31542__End"/>be in <lb n="c57-0172__main__12"/> spite of himself invaded by suspicion. <lb n="c57-0172__main__13"/> But I enjoyed friends dear not only by <lb n="c57-0172__main__14"/> association but for their<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31556__Start"/>e<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31556__End"/> own sake –and <lb n="c57-0172__main__15"/> wherever I am the soothing voice of my <lb n="c57-0172__main__16"/> Eliszabeth or the conversation of Cler<lb n="c57-0172__main__17"/>val will be ever whispered <mdel>to</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>in my ear. <lb n="c57-0172__main__18"/> They are dead & but one feeling <del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31587__Start"/>could<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31587__End"/>can in <lb n="c57-0172__main__19"/> such a <del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31599__Start"/>situation<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31599__End"/>solitude<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31608__Start"/>keep me alive<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31608__End"/>persuade me to preserve my life. If I <lb n="c57-0172__main__20"/> w<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31617__Start"/>h<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31617__End"/>ere engaged in any high undertaking <lb n="c57-0172__main__21"/> or design fraught with extensive uti<lb n="c57-0172__main__22"/>lity to my fellow creatures then could I <lb n="c57-0172__main__23"/> live to fulfil it—But such is not my <lb n="c57-0172__main__24"/> destiny –I must pursue & destroy the <lb n="c57-0172__main__25"/><del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31637__Start"/>creature<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e31637__End"/><lb n="c57-0172__left_margin__1"/>being to whom I gave existence then <lb n="c57-0172__main__26"/> my task will be fulfilled & I may die.
